author: cmpilato
msg: Rename a confusingly-named mod_dav_svn helper function in anticipation
of the introduction of a parallel function of similar purpose.
In many cases, this required some minor code formatting tweaks.  In a
couple of cases, the tweaks were slightly more extensive.  But the net
logic change of this commit is expected to be nil.
comment's formatting here.  Callers updated to use the new name.
Callers of dav_svn__send_xml() updated to use dav_svn__brigade_printf().
